set1.question: I can identify cases where the AI might be making a mistake.
The AI system's explanation helps me judge how trustworthy its prediction is.
The AI's explanation helps me understand what actions I should take next.
I know how to adjust my decisions based on what the AI explains.
The AI system's explanation makes it clear why specific diseases or specialists were recommended.
The AI system's explanation helps me understand how the patient's symptoms influence its predictions.
I feel confident using the AI system's explanations to make decisions about which specialist to visit first.
